categories: Category:Years in the Old Sith Wars

nodes.text: The year 3962 before the Battle of Yavin (BBY), also known as 309 before the Treaty of Coruscant, 2,962 before the Ruusan Reformation and 3,927 before the Great ReSynchronization, was a standard year during the Mandalorian Wars.

During the year 3962 BBY, the Mandalorians advanced from their empire carved out in the Outer Rim Territories towards the inner galactic regions. With a two-pronged assault called Mandalorian Triumph, they fought their way to the Core Worlds, taking a number of planets before achieving their goal of conquering Duro.
